# Auto-generated for Coordinate shared assets and templates
def coordinate_shared_assets_and_templates(base_dir="apps", shared_dir="apps/shared_templates"):
    """Copy template folders from each app into a shared directory."""
    import os, shutil
    os.makedirs(shared_dir, exist_ok=True)
    copied = []
    for name in os.listdir(base_dir):
        path = os.path.join(base_dir, name)
        templates_path = os.path.join(path, "templates")
        if os.path.isdir(templates_path):
            dest = os.path.join(shared_dir, name)
            os.makedirs(dest, exist_ok=True)
            for file in os.listdir(templates_path):
                src_file = os.path.join(templates_path, file)
                dst_file = os.path.join(dest, file)
                if os.path.isfile(src_file):
                    shutil.copy2(src_file, dst_file)
            copied.append(name)
    return copied
